member.name: M:AreaExtensions.get_Value(Dynamicweb.Content.Area,System.String)
member.summary: Implemenets Dynamicweb.Content.Area get_Value() method for compatibility with DW8 templates

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Base.Request(System.String)
member.summary: Instead of using Request.QueryString or Request.Form
member.param: Name of the value in the request collection
member.returns: The value of the specified key
member.remarks: By default the return value has been SQL Escaped (Database.SQLEscapeInjection)

members.member:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Instead of using Request.QueryString or Request.Form
Name of the value in the request collection Specifies wether the return value should be SQL Escaped, but only for values in the Querystring
[np] 24/02/2006 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Returns the contents of a text file as a string.
Path and name of text file to read.
strFile must contain the physical path to the file e.g. "C:/Testfile.txt"
[bbr] 11-04-2005 Comments edited [daf] 16-03-2005 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Read the current text file in a particular encoding.
Path and name of text file to read. As System.Text.Encoding, to determin a particular encoding.
strFile must contain the physical path to the file e.g. "C:/Testfile.txt"
Returns the contents of a text file as a string.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Writes a string to a text file.
String to write to the file. Path and name of text file to write. Boolean indicating whether to append to the file. True to append, False to overwrite file.
strFile must contain the physical file path to the file e.g. Server.Mappath("/files/filer/Testfile.txt")
[bbr] 11-04-2005 Comments edited [daf] 16-03-2005 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Writes a string to a text file in a particular encoding.
String to write to the file. Path and name of text file to write. Boolean indicating whether to append to the file. True to append, False to overwrite file. As System.Text.Encoding, to determin a particular encoding.
strFile must contain the physical file path to the file e.g. Server.Mappath("/files/filer/Testfile.txt")
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Reads a setting from the globalsettings file.
Name of the setting.
If the selected settings does not exist an empty string is returned.

member.name: F:Dynamicweb.Dates.DateFormatString
member.summary: Returns a string for String.Format: "ddd, dd MMM yyyy HH':'mm"

member.name: F:Dynamicweb.Dates.DateOnlyFormatString
member.summary: Returns a string for String.Format: "ddd, dd MMM yyyy"

member.name: F:Dynamicweb.Dates.DateFormatStringShort
member.summary: Returns a string for String.Format: "dd MMM yyyy HH':'mm"

member.name: F:Dynamicweb.Dates.DateFormatStringDayAndMonth
member.summary: Returns a string for String.Format: "dd. MMM"

member.name: F:Dynamicweb.Dates.DateFormatStringFull
member.summary: Returns a string for String.Format: "ddd, dd MMM yyyy HH':'mm':'ss"

member.name: F:Dynamicweb.Dates.DateOnlyFormatStringShort
member.summary: Returns a string for String.Format: "dd-mm-yyyy"

member.name: F:Dynamicweb.Dates.TimeOnlyFormatStringFull
member.summary: Returns a string for String.Format: "hh:mm:ss"

member.name: T:Dynamicweb.Input
member.summary: Utility class to handle input from web requests and formatting of data from external sources such as querystrings or databases. Ensures formatting and shortcuts to getting secure data from forms and querystrings.

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Input.Request(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the specified string from the QueryString, Form, Cookies, or ServerVariables collections.
member.param: The name of the collection member to get.

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Input.Request(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets the specified string from the QueryString, Form, Cookies, or ServerVariables collections.
member.param: The name of the collection member to get.
member.returns: The QueryString, Form, Cookies, or ServerVariables collection member specified in the key parameter. If the specified key is not found, then a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) is returned.

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Input.RequestInteger(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the specified integer from the QueryString, Form, Cookies, or ServerVariables collections.
member.param: The name of the collection member to get.
member.returns: The QueryString, Form, Cookies, or ServerVariables collection member specified in the key parameter. If the specified key is not found or not a valid integer, then 0 is returned.

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Input.RequestDouble(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the specified double from the QueryString, Form, Cookies, or ServerVariables collections.
member.param: The name of the collection member to get.
member.returns: The QueryString, Form, Cookies, or ServerVariables collection member specified in the key parameter. If the specified key is not found or not a valid double, then 0 is returned.

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Input.RequestLong(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the specified long from the QueryString, Form, Cookies, or ServerVariables collections.
member.param: The name of the collection member to get.
member.returns: The QueryString, Form, Cookies, or ServerVariables collection member specified in the key parameter. If the specified key is not found or not a valid long, then 0 is returned.

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Input.RequestBoolean(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the specified boolean from the QueryString, Form, Cookies, or ServerVariables collections.
member.param: The name of the collection member to get.
member.returns: The QueryString, Form, Cookies, or ServerVariables collection member specified in the key parameter. If the specified key is not found or not a valid boolean, then false is returned.

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Input.RequestDate(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the specified Date from the QueryString, Form, Cookies, or ServerVariables collections.
member.param: The name of the collection member to get.
member.returns: The QueryString, Form, Cookies, or ServerVariables collection member specified in the key parameter. If the specified key is not found or not a valid boolean, then false is returned.

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Input.HasRequest(System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified key contains in request(form or query string).

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Input.FormatString(System.Object)
member.summary: Formats the input to a valid string. If the specified input is not a valid string, then String.Empty is returned.
member.returns: A valid string. If the specified input is not a valid string, then String.Empty is returned.

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Input.FormatBoolean(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines wether or not input is 'something' (as opposed to nothing), and if the object type is a boolean. If so, the function returns the value of the boolean object. In all other cases false is returned.
member.returns: A valid boolean. If the specified input is not a valid boolean, then false is returned.

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Input.FormatBoolean(System.String)
member.summary: Formats the input to a valid boolean. If the specified input is not a valid boolean, then false is returned.
member.returns: A valid boolean. If input is IsNullOrEmpty, "false", "0", "off" or "no" it returns false; otherwise true. Case insensitive.

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Input.FormatInteger(System.Object)
member.summary: Formats the input to a valid integer. If the specified input is not a valid integer, then 0 is returned.
member.returns: A valid integer. If the specified input is not a valid integer, then 0 is returned.

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Input.FormatInteger64(System.Object)
member.summary: Formats the input to a valid integer. If the specified input is not a valid integer, then 0 is returned.
member.returns: A valid integer. If the specified input is not a valid integer, then 0 is returned.

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Input.FormatLong(System.Object)
member.summary: Formats the input to a valid long. If the specified input is not a valid long, then 0 is returned.
member.returns: A valid long. If the specified input is not a valid long, then 0 is returned.

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Input.FormatDouble(System.Object)
member.summary: Formats the input to a valid double. If the specified input is not a valid double, then 0 is returned.
member.returns: A valid double. If the specified input is not a valid double, then 0 is returned.

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Input.FormatDouble(System.Object,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Formats the input to a valid double. If the specified input is not a valid double, then 0 is returned.
member.param: if true the current culture of the frontend pageview or the backend user is used for parsing.
member.returns: A valid double. If the specified input is not a valid double, then 0 is returned.

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Input.FormatDate(System.Object)
member.summary: Formats the input to a valid Date. If the specified input is not a valid Date, then Date.MinValue is returned.

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Input.ParseDouble(System.String)
member.summary: Parses the input to a valid double. If the specified input is not a valid double, then 0 is returned.
member.param: The input to format - a string represenation of something that is a double.
member.returns: A valid double. If the specified input is not a valid double, then 0.0 is returned. "1234.12" is parsed as 1234.12 "1234,12" is parsed as 1234.12 "1,234.12" is parsed as 1234.12 "1.234,12" is parsed as 1234.12 null (nothing in Visual Basic) is parsed as 0.0 String.Empty is parsed as 0.0
